ctu_text: Differently Abled & Senior Citizens Assistance Corporation, Andhra Pradesh, \"Sanctioning of Touch Phone to Hearing Challenged \u2013 Speech Impaired\" under its action Plan 2017-18, aims to provide touch phones to hearing challenged \u2013 speech impaired individuals who know sign language. The touch phones are distributed by the Assistant Directors, Department for the Welfare of Differently Abled & Senior Citizens, and District Managers, A. P. Differently Abled & Senior Citizens Assistance Corporation.
